title: Ninety Six National Historic Site: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Trail Closures  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Trail Closures  In order to protect both the resources and our visitors from conditions left by excessive rainfall, the Gouedy Trail and ALL Equestrian Trails will remain closed until further notice.
